extendedInfo.description: Get hold of this awesome android action game that to for FREE !!.You have to protect the fire core from the red enemy balls that shrink the core and get hold of the protective blue and green balls. Use the non continuous ring shield around the core to protect it from enemy balls. The objective of this fun game is to keep moving the ring shield around the core to prevent the enemy balls to touch the core and shrink it. Rotate the shield in such a way that only helpful blue and green balls are absorbed and attacking balls hit the shield and vanish. The game is over when the core diminishes in size completely .- When the red crazy balls come in contact with the core they degrade the core.-The dark blue balls when absorbed by core form a protective layer which does not let the red balls degrade the core for a certain time period. -The green balls when absorbed by core increases the size ofcore by some fraction. When the core diminishes completely then the game is over.Features:-The game offers three stunning themes with amazing graphicsâSunlight, Moonlight and Galaxy.-It has three difficulty levels to choose from-easy ,medium and hard. The speed of incoming balls increases from easy to hard levels.-Settings for switching the sounds off or on as per your wish.-High score for each difficulty level is maintained .-Mesmerizing graphics and great sound effects are used which makes the game even more addictive.Isnât this game irresistible ? So why wait..get this cool game now !! Itâs a simple game but yet challenging game which tests your reflexes and strategic thinking.The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V.It is also designed for Samsung Galaxy note and tablets. No internet connectivity is required to play this game.If you like our app, share it with your friends and family through facebook, twitter, googleplus.Stay tuned with us as very soon we will be releasing more fun android apps .Tags: strategy game, ball games, space game, ring games, collision game, fire ball.
